changeHistory.comment: I feel this is not a bug since we have seen such sigabrts in the past. When the test takes more than 30 mins to complete, the harness calls a sigabrt. I'll take a look at the test and see if it can be fixed and will close the bug if that's possible. Thanks!!

I see that in 6.0, these sigabrts have not been happening for some time now. I have updated the test in 5.0 with the minor changes in 6.0. Let's keep this bug open and track the results for a week or so and then if we do not see any sigabrts in this test, I feel we can close the bug. Thanks!!
This crash seems to be due to bug16375 with Alarm in thread and Abort in thread messages in the ErrorLog.txt

Since I saw an 'Address already in use' message in the ErrorLog, I have changed the port number for the appservers in flex-rep-binary-same-uri-diff-content.xml. If the error does not reproduce for a few days consistently, then we can assume that there is some issue with cleanup following the previous test flex-rep-binary-with-push-local-forests.xml.
Closing this bug since this is the same issue as bug 16375.
